rules_text: If you would scry, surveil, or haul a number of cards, you may instead put that many +1/+1 counters on No-Eyed Girl.
notes:
Inspiration — Children as horror movie monsters/strange creatures

Mechanical Uniqueness — References mechanic that doesn’t show up in mystvale, crossover with Feralitator project

10.29.23 MV2 —> MV3
